name: Hospital Dash - Healthcare Time Management Game
name_original: Hospital Dash - Healthcare Time Management Game
description:
IT’S A HOSPITAL EMERGENCY. WE NEED YOU!

The patients keep coming and you’re the only one who can nurse them back to health! Manage your time as a busy nurse and work fast to diagnose, treat and cure all those in need of your skills! Give the best that you can on this healthcare simulator game.

Are you ready to face the worst challenge of your life on this doctor simulator? Then, get yourself together, bring your weapons and prepare your fingers, because you are going to need them. This doctor simulator clicker game are not for noobs! The patients are waiting and you don’t have enough time!

🏥 A Healthcare simulator clicker game with time management

The patients don’t stop to come, the diseases are tricky to cure! How many patients you can take care at a time? Treat many diseases in this full hospital simulator - if you can.

To play Hospital Dash you must not leave no patient unattended with tour time management skills and prove to the town you have the best ER in town. Take your emergency room to a role new level in this ER simulator game.

So much to do, so little time! Tackle these other time management challenges, if you dare!

👩🏽‍⚕ A Doctor simulator

Be a doctor in this take care simulator game and play many healthcare and medical simulator mini games. Do not forget to diagnose diseases, save lives and become the best nurse in town! Can you imagine that on this doctor simulator clicker game?

You have to improve your hospital simulator and its equipment to build your healthcare simulator game empire. In this clicker game, you can take your hospital to hole new levels in this ER simulator game.

🏨 Hospital Dash is better than any TV Medical Drama

Dash and rush of an ER simulator more feverish than any TV medical drama, darting from patient to patient to fix everything from painful dirty ears to sad frozen hearts. Patch wounds with surgical precision and earn money to improve your medical equipment and treat even more patients!

🚑 Upgrade the hospital simulator and take care of more patients

Diagnose and treat many different diseases in 70 action-filled healthcare simulator levels. Don’t forget to unlock cutting-edge medical equipment to improve your hospital simulator and leave no patient unattended. It’s a time management game challenge!

Push your limits in difficult medical simulator game and become the most efficient healthcare nurse in town! Take care of people and build your ER simulator empire game!

It’s a beautiful day to save lives!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
